info.title: AuthorizationManagementClient
info.description: Role based access control provides you a way to apply granular level policy administration down to individual resources or resource groups. These operations enable you to manage role assignments. A role assignment grants access to Azure Active Directory users.

get.description: Gets all role assignments for the subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of role assignments.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: Longer message explaining the details of the error

Error.description: Object to be thrown in case of an unsuccesful response

roleAssignmentsLimit.description: The maximum number of role assignments that can be created

roleAssignmentsCurrentCount.description: The current number of role assignments that have been created

roleAssignmentsRemainingCount.description: The number of role assignments that can be created before reaching the limit

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.
